channel.title: Send Message help
channel.description: i'm working on making cooking like runescape except without interfaces does anyone know how to make it say for example if you got cook shrimp but you burn it you get the message you accidentally burnt the shrimp but if you didn't burn it you get the message you succesfully cook the shrimp. i know how to get the random item but how do i get that part? can someone help me please?
